title: Wonderful world
brief_description: A world tour the easy way. The Swiss Alps, Venice, Florence, Rome, Vienna, Amsterdam , Brussels, the East, Egypt, and Arabia, India, Japan and the Pacific, Africa, Australia, Canada and the USA, South America - songs and dances, the Sphinx, and the Taj Mahal, Notre Dame in Paris , bull fighting in Spain, and St Lawrence sea-way, from London to Penang; The Statue to liberty to Sydney harbour Bridge; and many other famous and exotic places.
